JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish speaking Technical Customer Support agents, Lisbon, Portugal
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
linkAnordic, Oslo, Norge, is looking for Danish speaking Technical Customer Support agents to Lisbon!

If you are interested in experiencing the fun life in Lisbon and progress your career abroad, then this job opportunity is for you! 

Who you will be joining 

You will have the unique opportunity to build your international career in a fast-paced growth company based in sunny Lisbon, Portugal. They are over 1000 employees and have several projects for some of the biggest brands around the world!

What you'll do

  • As a Danish speaking technical support agent in Lisbon you will:
  • Respond appropriately to customer escalations and escalate issues and customers to higher tiers of support as defined and documented.
  • Respond to inbound customer requests , document relevant case information.
  • Ability to adapt the brand’s voice and tone for interactions on both private (phone/email/chat/messaging channels) and public (social, forums, ecommerce reviews) channels.
  • Ensure excellent customer satisfaction.
  • Collaborate with other technicians/support agents to resolve or properly close help tickets.
  • Manage an individual ticket queue.
  • Provide feedback helpful feedback.

Who are we looking for:

  • Proficient Danish (C2).
  • Fluency in English (B2).
  • Possess excellent writing and verbal communication skills to simplify technical language for non-technical users.
  • Demonstrate patience when communicating and solving issues.
  • Treat all data and personal information with utmost confidentiality.
  • Proactive, self-motivated and a great team player.
  • Previous experience in technical Troubleshooting / customer support.
  • For non-EU residents, it is mandatory to have a valid work permit.

You’ll enjoy:

  • 4 open vacancies, bring a friend! 
  • Contract type - CDI - 3 months of trial period 
  • The gross annual salary incl. language & performance bonus 22,200€ 
  • Monthly base gross salary 1500€ (paid 14 times per year) 
  • Performance bonus 100€ (paid 12 times per year) 
  • Working hours Monday to Friday – (8 am to 5 pm) 
  • Transportation allowance 
  • Monthly meal allowance
  • Relocation package: 
    • 6 Months of reimbursement for accommodation, up to 280 Euros per month, (discounted directly from the payslip) 
    • Reimbursement of your flight ticket, up to 200 Euros after 6 months in the company 
    • Help setting up tax and bank account documentation
  • Health insurance with a dental plan (after 6 months contract) 
  • Opportunity to participate in numerous company activities, like their company wellness-program 
  • Opportunity to professionally grow in a cool company 
  • Work with a diverse environment 
  • Benefit from many discounts in local businesses, company parties, events and much more!
  • Work and enjoy life in Lisbon 

A few things to have in mind before applying:

  • This job opportunity is in Lisbon Portugal), which means you would need to relocate to Lisbon if you do not live there already.
  • This is an office/work-on-site role, meaning that you would be working from the office and not from home/remotely.

More information:

Puojan Rahdeirjoo, +47 4106 8318, info@linkanordic.com

How to apply?

https://www.linkanordic.com/danish-jobs-abroad-/dansktalende-teknisk-kundesupport-til-lissabon

(fra NAV EURES Norge)
